title: 1927년 Westfall 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Westfall. 판결일: 1927-06-07. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: WESTFALL v. UNITED STATES
**판결일**: 1927-06-07
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

## 인용

- 5 Ohio Law. Abs. 587

## 판결문 요약


Conspiracy to commit crime different offense from crime that is object of conspiracy, and if conspirators are separately punishable for both conspiracy and substantive offense, the fact that One was incapable of independently committing such offense cannot avoid application of established doctrine.
...

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
